methods.array:
Converts a primitive array to a Vector.

:param values: (short[]) - primitive array
:return: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) Vector.
methods.concat:
Returns the concatenation of multiple arrays into a single array.

*Overload 1*  
  :param values: (short[]...) - values.
  :return: (short[]) concatenation of multiple arrays into a single array.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param values: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector...) - values.
  :return: (short[]) concatenation of multiple arrays into a single array.
methods.count:
Counts the number of non-null values.

*Overload 1*  
  :param values: (java.lang.Short[]) - values.
  :return: (int) number of non-null values.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param values: (short[]) - values.
  :return: (int) number of non-null values.
  
*Overload 3*  
  :param values: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) - values.
  :return: (int) number of non-null values.
methods.countDistinct:
Counts the number of distinct elements in the array.

*Overload 1*  
  :param values: (short[]) - values.
  :return: (long) number of distinct non-null values.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param values: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) - values.
  :return: (long) number of distinct non-null values.
  
*Overload 3*  
  :param values: (short[]) - values.
  :param countNull: (boolean) - true to count null values, and false to exclude null values.
  :return: (long) number of distinct values.
  
*Overload 4*  
  :param values: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) - values.
  :param countNull: (boolean) - true to count null values, and false to exclude null values.
  :return: (long) number of distinct values.
methods.distinct:
Returns an array containing only the distinct values from the input.

*Overload 1*  
  :param values: (short[]) - values.
  :return: (short[]) unsorted array containing only distinct non-null items from arr.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param values: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) - values.
  :return: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) unsorted array containing only distinct non-null items from arr.
  
*Overload 3*  
  :param values: (short[]) - values.
  :param includeNull: (boolean) - true to include null values, and false to exclude null values.
  :param sort: (boolean) - true to sort the resultant array
  :return: (short[]) array containing only distinct items from arr.
  
*Overload 4*  
  :param values: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) - values.
  :param includeNull: (boolean) - true to include null values, and false to exclude null values.
  :param sort: (boolean) - true to sort the resultant array
  :return: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) array containing only distinct items from arr.
methods.enlist:
Returns a list containing its arguments.

:param values: (short...) - values.
:return: (short[]) list containing values.
methods.first:
Returns the first value from an array.

*Overload 1*  
  :param values: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) - values.
  :return: (short) first value from the array.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param values: (short[]) - values.
  :return: (short) first value from the array.
methods.in:
Checks if a value is within a discrete set of possible values.

:param testedValues: (short) - tested value.
:param possibleValues: (short...) - possible values.
:return: (boolean) true if the tested value is contained in the possible values, and false otherwise.
methods.inRange:
Checks if a value is within a range.

:param testedValue: (short) - tested value.
:param lowInclusiveValue: (short) - lower inclusive bound of the range.
:param highInclusiveValue: (short) - upper inclusive bound of the range.
:return: (boolean) true if the tested value is within the range, and false if the tested value is not in the range or is null.
methods.isNull:
Determines if a value is null.

:param value: (short) - value.
:return: (boolean) true if the value is null, and false otherwise.
methods.last:
Returns the last value from an array.

*Overload 1*  
  :param values: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) - values.
  :return: (short) last value from the array.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param values: (short[]) - values.
  :return: (short) last value from the array.
methods.nth:
Returns the nth value from an array.

*Overload 1*  
  :param index: (int) - index of the value to return.
  :param values: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) - values.
  :return: (short) nth value from the array or null, if the index is outside of the array's index range.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param index: (int) - index of the value to return.
  :param values: (short[]) - values.
  :return: (short) nth value from the array or null, if the index is outside of the array's index range.
methods.nullToValue:
Replaces null values with a default value.

*Overload 1*  
  :param value: (short) - value.
  :param defaultValue: (short) - default value to return for null values.
  :return: (short) value, if value is not null, and defaultValue if value is null.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param values: (short[]) - values.
  :param defaultValue: (short) - default value to return for null values.
  :return: (short[]) values with nulls replaced by defaultValue.
  
*Overload 3*  
  :param values: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) - values.
  :param defaultValue: (short) - default value to return for null values.
  :return: (short[]) values with nulls replaced by defaultValue.
methods.repeat:
Returns an array with a value repeated.

:param value: (short) - value.
:param size: (int) - number of times to repeat the value.
:return: (short[]) array of repeated values.  If size is less than zero, an empty array is returned.
methods.reverse:
Returns an array with the values reversed.

*Overload 1*  
  :param values: (short...) - values.
  :return: (short[]) array with the values reversed.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param values: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) - values.
  :return: (short[]) array with the values reversed.
methods.unbox:
Unboxes a array of values.

:param values: (java.lang.Short...) - values.
:return: (short[]) unboxed array of values.
methods.uniqueValue:
Get the single unique value in the array, or null if there are none, or there are more than 1 distinct values.

:param arr: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) - the array
:param countNull: (boolean) - if nulls should count as values
:return: (short) the single unique value in the array, or null.
methods.vec:
Converts a Vector to a primitive array.

:param values: (io.deephaven.vector.ShortVector) - Vector
:return: (short[]) primitive array.

text: A set of commonly used functions that can be applied to Short types.
